original_title: Wake Open - Red Bull Signature Series 2012
overview: In Red Bull Wake Open, the best riders on the planet will come together in Tampa to compete in 1, 2 or possibly 3 of the following categories: Park, Boat, and Big Air. The top athletes in each discipline will be crowned the best wakeboarders in the world. Athletes will be judged on overall impression and a score-based system with single elimination qualifiers in this 3-day event.
title: Wake Open - Red Bull Signature Series 2012
